text: Ivvare, inaivaittu vanankupavarkalil palar (tankale) tankal kulantaikalaik kolai ceyvatai avarkal alakakak kanumpati avarkalutaiya teyvankal ceytu avarkalaip patukuliyil talli, avarkalutaiya markkattaiyum kulappamakkivittana. Allah natiyiruntal avarkal ivvaru ceytirukka mattarkal. Akave, (napiye!) Nir avarkalaiyum avarkalutaiya poyk kurrukalaiyum vittu vituviraka
